logentry.author: mark.chen
logentry.msg:
merge CNC2: CNC2 Build Time: 2018-08-21 15:30 CNC2 Version: 00008
the logs are in the following:
fix: 修正自動merge核心SVN位置
fix: 更新版號
copy to
merge: ATEST_923_b_FCRebootFail, 193849, to trunk by 儀禕
fix
修正FC系列reboot無效問題
merge: CNCKL_2334_f_AddLX45_v3, 191899-192114, to trunk by 儀禕
feature
1. 新增0x22, 0x25韌體。 2. 新增單板(0xFF) LX45韌體。
merge: CNCKL_2186_f_RemovePinout, 190611-191780, to trunk by 儀禕
feature
[內部] 移除多餘的CNC2 pin define。
merge: CNCKL_2232_f_DCMOut, 179088-179420, to trunk, 10.118.0, 10.116.54, 10.116.36 by 儀禕
feature
[內部] 優化ECAT時鐘模組管理。
merge: CNCKL_2231_f_FCM350MHz, 178105-178107, to trunk merge: CNCKL_2231_f_FCM350MHz, 178105, to 10.118.0, 10.116.54, to 10.116.36 by 儀禕
feature
優化FC-B、60WA、60DB、71SA韌體時鐘架構。
merge: CNCKL_2125_f_BUFG, 177042-177687, to trunk merge: CNCKL_2125_f_BUFG_118_0x, 177241-177689, to 10.118.0 merge: CNCKL_2125_f_BUFG_116_54x, 177251-177690, to 10.116.54 merge: CNCKL_2125_f_BUFG_116_36x, 177253-177691, to 10.116.36 by 儀禕
feature
改善韌體時脈穩定性。
fix: timing error
fix: CNCKL-2120 版號+1
merge: CNCKL_2120_f_TimingConstraint, 176328-176518, to trunk merge: CNCKL_2120_f_TimingConstraint_118_0x, 176761-176866, to 10.118.0 merge: CNCKL_2120_f_TimingConstraint_116_54x, 176768-176867, to 10.116.54 merge: CNCKL_2120_f_TimingConstraint_116_36x, 176773-176868, to 10.116.36 by 儀禕
feature
增加控制器韌體(CNC2)時脈限制，確保韌體運作時序。
merge: CNCKL_2115_f_MergeKrnlAddCNC2Log, 173476-175058, to trunk merge: CNCKL_2115_f_MergeKrnlAddCNC2Log_118_0x, 173481-175059, to 10.118.0 merge: CNCKL_2115_f_MergeKrnlAddCNC2Log_116_54x, 173482-175060, to 10.116.54 merge: CNCKL_2115_f_MergeKrnlAddCNC2Log_116_36x, 174885-175061, to 10.116.36 by 儀禕
feature
[內部] 調整CNC2 merge流程，自動撈回CNC2 log，並在commit回kernel時一起寫到commit log。
